channel.title: A Software Craftsman's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on A Software Craftsman's Blog

item.title: Paper export test
item.description: Sample: Brainstorm Lets create a low-fi prototype of a polygon gaming app as a proof of concept. As a new medium, users may not be familiar with virtual reality interactions yet. Because the virtual reality canvas is infinite, guiding user focus and attention presents unique challenges not present in 2D applications. This spec will cover successful interactive patterns and how to avoid common design mistakes that confuse users with virtual reality interfaces.

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Abhay, and I am a software engineer. Currently, I work on the blockchain team at Facebook. I believe I have found my ikigai in building high-quality software systems, and hope to share some of my passion for the craft with readers of this blog.
